entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Fort Nelson
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:35 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -34.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Fort Nelson Airport 11:40 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -34.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.8 kPa rising
Visibility: 6.4 km
Humidity: 67 %
Wind Chill: -43
Dewpoint: -38.6°C
Wind: S 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 33.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 33. Wind chill minus 44 this morning and minus 39 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 35.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending before morning then partly cloudy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 35. Wind chill near minus 41. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 30 except minus 26 over southern sections.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon then periods of snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 30 except minus 26 over southern sections. Wind chill minus 41 in the morning and minus 36 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022
